categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars

nodes.text: The "Red Shoulders" were B1-series battle droids under the command of General Grievous that had red-painted shoulders, special program sensors tuned up in their bodies, and could rotate their heads and waists 360 degrees.
The "Red Shoulders" were slated to appear in the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, though they were ultimately cut from the series.
